edu.spa.ftclib.internal.activator

Class ServoActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.spa.ftclib.internal.activator.ServoActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Activable

    public class ServoActivator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Activable
    Created by Gabriel on 2017-11-02; edited substantially on 2017-12-28. Use this if you have a servo that you normally only set to two positions (e.g. an arm that holds something in place). It will store the positions, and then you can call setActivated(true) and setActivated(false) to automatically activate and deactivate the servo. The servo is public, so if you ever need to move it to a different position or change a setting you can do that.
